alert.note: Alert for Miami (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 31 at 9:12AM CDT until June 02 at 9:29PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill MO has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kansas... Marais Des Cygnes River at Osawatomie affecting Miami County. This product along with additional weather and stream information is available at www.weather.gov/kc/. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO LATE FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Marais Des Cygnes River at Osawatomie. * WHEN...From this evening to late Friday evening. * IMPACTS...At 28.0 feet, Low-lying areas along the river begin to flood. At 31.0 feet, 347th Road or Main Street east of Highway 169 is under water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 16.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 32.7 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 28.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Obs Forecasts Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri 1pm 1pm 1pm Marais Des Cygnes River Osawatomie 28.0 16.0 Wed 8am 18.7 32.0 19.8 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
